comment.author: 31846825@N04
comment._content: Accompanying note: "A big kiss was received by Cpl. Travis Taylor from his best girl, Beth Brown, [424?] Talaflo Rd., as he shoved off for two weeks' field training at Camp [LeJeune], N. C. with the Tallahassee First Tank Company, U. S. Marine Corps Reserve. The five officers and [64?] enlisted men are scheduled to return July 30. While at camp they will concentrate on firing all weapons of the [M-55?] tank, Maj. J. Worth Owen, commanding officer, said."
comment.authorname: State Library and Archives of Florida
